name: Carrot Consomme
keywords: appetizer, side dish, carrot, ginger, onion, fall
recipeIngredient: 2 inches fresh ginger, split in half lengthwise

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a large pot with 3 quarts of water over very low heat. Simmer for 3 hours. Remove from heat and cool for 1 hour. Strain carefully through a fine mesh strainer. Discard the vegetables and reserve the broth.
